# Bonesmasher (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] ([[Necrophagy Spells|necrophagy]]) \[[[Sonic Spells|sonic]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[2nd Level Oracle Spells|Oracle 2]]

**BoXM:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Area:** 10-ft. radius burst

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** See text

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Deep Magic (Kobold Press), pg. 135

This spell creates a jarring resonance in the bones of any creature in the area. Against [[Skeleton (Bestiary PF1)|skeletons]], [[Lich (Bestiary PF1)|liches]], or other creatures made up primarily of bone, this spell deals 1d6 hp sonic damage per caster level, maximum 5d6. Such creatures can attempt a Reflex saving throw to halve the damage. Against living creatures with a skeletal structure, this spell leaves them [[Staggered|staggered]] for one round. Living creatures affected by this spell can attempt a Fortitude saving throw to negate the effect.
